item.title: Adding font in Ubuntu 1204
item.description: To add font move the ttf file into the folder usr/share/fonts/ttf then remove fonts cache by rm -f /usr/share/fonts/*fonts.cache-1 then create the cache again sudo fc-cache that’s it, added ttf can be seen in all the text editors.
